Name: Build Your Own World
Description: 2D game world in Java with interactive movement, enemies, and avatar customization.

Name: Web Proposal
Description: Melody Explorer is a relaxing music discovery app that helps you find calming, cozy, and focused songs through moods, previews, and beautiful album art.

Name: Business Communication Project
Description: A simple six-slide intro to calculus that explains what it is, why it matters for CS, and how ideas like derivatives and integrals appear in algorithms, AI, graphics, and modeling.

Name: LightCount - A NeoPixel Guessing Game
Description: LightCount is an interactive guessing game built with NeoPixels and a keypad. In each round, a random number of LEDs light up, and the player must quickly count them and enter the correct number using the keypad.
